body_html:
I don't think we have immediate plans to implement these - happy to review PRs!

In sparse_reduce_sum_op.cc, most logic can be factored out, and only the aggregate function
.sum() here needs to be changed, I think.

body:
I don't think we have immediate plans to implement these - happy to review PRs!  

In `sparse_reduce_sum_op.cc`, most logic can be factored out, and only [the aggregate function 
 .sum() here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/kernels/sparse_reduce_sum_op.cc#L198) needs to be changed, I think.
